title: Did Obama in the last three years see more jobs that she created than the first three years of Trump?
subtitle: Left-wing critics of US President Donald Trump rejected his claims to oversee unprecedented economic growth in early 2020. Who was right?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: During the last three years of Barack Obama ' s presidency, the number of jobs added was 1.5 million more than during the first three years of President Donald Trump ' s tenure.
